hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/ads/webapps/ads*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
./deployapp.sh -a ads -t Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-engine -e 10.13.18.116 -r ${VERSION} -i ads -v

#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/ads/webapps/ads*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
./deployapp.sh -a ads -t Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-engine -e 10.13.18.116 -r ${VERSION} -i psn -v

#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/ads/webapps/ads*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
./deployapp.sh -a cis -t Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-engine -e 10.13.18.116 -r ${VERSION} -i cis -v
